comments.comment: always appreciate all the love on these, makes it so much more fun to share. thanks guy

Seeing you quit school, talk about your online relationship, moving to Italy to make it physical, moving out to UK together, becoming the king of youtube and then getting married and moving out somewhere where you feel like you can grow some roots has been the best story arc I have ever seen unfold before my eyes. I am extremely happy for you guys. I really appreciate these vlog style videos, makes it feel more personal.
When Edgar greeted you at the door and picked up his leash I couldn’t help but smile. I am genuinely enjoying these vlogs

Gotta just love how great of a dog owner Felix is. Keeping EVERY concern about their comfort as a top priority, going out of his way to give them the best possible life in their old age. Then training them to bring the leash when they need to go out is the cherry on top. Respect 100.
I love how he just kept mentioning Marzia for everything  love these two
It’s crazy to think that one day I was 13 years old, dying of laughter to his vids and now I’m 22 smiling at how much he’s grown and done so well for himself

21:24 So, there was one thing I learned from a paramedic a while ago. It specifically was in reference to gatorade, but probably applies to other drinks as well. The paramedic basically said that if a person is in need of electrolytes, gatorade will taste much sweeter than it normally would. I learned it after a hard day of working and drinking mostly water and then having a racing pulse at the end of my work day. Otherwise I felt fine. work called paramedics to be sure. they checked me out and told me of the whole gatorade thing. they brought me one and damn if that wasn't the sweetest gatorade I've ever tasted. 

Completely not what is going on here, but just saying that taste changes with bodily needs. Pewds just didn't need that drink.

bruh I swear, since PewDiePie's move to Japan, his YouTube content changed drastically and although its so different than what he did before, I'd say I'm definitely enjoying it. Bro fist to pewds and all the bros out there ️

I'm not saying I dislike Felix's other content, but these vlogs of Japan are honestly the most calming and wholesome videos I've ever seen of his. They both just seem like they're being more genuine and giving an honest look at their daily life.

As a long-time viewer who witnessed most of your eras, I must say the moving to japan era has been my favorite by a landslide. It just makes me happy man, watching yall living your best life, take care

this is the kind of vlog that i love. It's all "check this out" "it's so cool!" and then speaking trivia about things. It's not flex, it's like you are walking right beside him and see what he's showing you

When you did the cinematic bike ride it made me tear up a bit, watching people living their best life makes me so happy and japan was clearly meant for you guys. If you see this thanks for sharing this all with us, big love from Brighton! (:

I love the way Pewds is so positive about everything. He is like a child discovering things for the first time. It gives me such a warm feeling of that life is good and everything's gonna be alright eventually.

When we’re younger we enjoyed watching pewds playing video games and shouting at the computer but as we grow older we realised that the new content pewds uploads is what we needed now, calmer and refreshing.
I love felix's content now. So wholesome and you can see how he is so happy. Marzia and felix you both deserve this happiness.
EDGAR PICKING UP HIS LEASH ALL EXCITED IS ADORABLE!!
chill meter maxed out
These Japan vlogs remind me when Marzia used to do Youtube - chill, simple, and so calming. I’m so happy for Pewds and Marzia for being so comfortable and living their best lives in Japan ️
These are so chill to watch
A lot of people have said it, but these vlogs are so good. Love seeing you, Marzia, Edgar, and Maya happy. The energy behind these is so calming and positive.
You guys just seem happier & more at peace these days, we love to see it.

20 minutes of a swedish guy walking around japan and saying "thats kinda sick" 

i love it so much

I can just tell how from a few clips of your relationship that you guys have the most pure love for each other. It's truly refreshing to admire your healthy and peaceful relationship. Yall are literally god level couple goals. I love how you guys are so into the japan lifestyle and culture! You are guys are amazing
The way you treat your doggos is so heartwarming. As I veterinarian I find it so enjoyable to watch. Pure love. Be happy in your new place on earth Pewds i Marzia <3
It's kinda refreshing to see that, after so many years of relationship, Felix still thinks about Marzia anywhere he goes without her.

The Japanese vibe with the vintage style video editing is an entire aesthetic. Good vibes all around and makes the viewers feel like they are actually there sharing the experience with Felix, Marzia, and Maya and Edgar.

marzia: goes out for a day
pewds: "since marzia's still away" "wish marzia was here" "i'll have to bring marzia here" "this is a family park so i feel silly being here alone"

it's so cute
東京の日常風景。抑制の効いたリアクション。夏のお台場をマッタリと家族で散策する愉しさの伝わる動画。
Really loved this one! Please do more vlogs!

"The honeymoon phase of a relationship doesn't last long"
Felix and Marzia:

i’m not really a vlog type of person but honestly this is some of the most amazing content i’ve watched lately, i really feel like you’re including all of us in your japan adventure/life which is a fun experience even just by watching. I hope you’re having an amazing time!

"They can be friends" 
Marzia: proceeds to eat the lobster
Edgar meeting you at the door with his lead is honestly the cutest thing I’ll see today
dang these videos are a vibe. Makes me want to hit the reset button from when I first came to Japan.
I just love how chill these vlogs are, so weird to think that when I first watched Pewds he was just some guy playing bad horror games speaking broken English. How times change
Pewds reminds me there’s always a beautiful life out there. You just gotta look for it

Growing up watching you and Marzia for the past 10 years now, I love watching these vlogs. It makes us all feel like a part of your family. So proud of everything you and Marzia have accomplished in life. So wholesome. We are all extremely happy for you both ️

So fun!! Thank you for sharing your adventures with us!! The food slide you found in that shop is for Japanese summer noodle called Somen! Traditionally we use carved bamboo and slide the noodle in it, then you catch it with chopsticks! It's called "Nagashi Somen"! The one you saw is for home use to enjoy with kids and family! I hope you get to try it soon!
For someone who has followed this channel for about a decade, so almost since the beginning, it makes me immensely happy seeing Marzia and Felix happy like this. Thanks for taking all of us with you.

Felix, this simple, relaxed "I moved to Japan" content is the best you've made in years. All of the noisy, tryhard, gotta-be-#1-on-youtube stuff absolutely pales in comparison. I subbed to you way way, way, back in the day because I found your gameplay vids interesting, but then lost interest when the channel became less about you and more about just grinding out content to gain viewers. Maybe that was necessary to get here, but this is where you're at your best.

I’ve grown up watching you, and I can’t express how happy I am for your both, you both seem so content and calm and happy in Japan, maya and Edgar seem to have settled in really nice and watching them in the car and on bike rides is just the cutest xxx

i cant help to say how much i love seeing  pewds living his best life, this guy literally taught me english back in 2011 when i was 10 years old.. Now i am 6 months away from graduating in marine biology and still smiling through all his videos! Thank you so much, pewds, for everything ️
エドガー君が「散歩に行こっ！」とリードをくわえて持ってくるのかわいすぎるw
It’s genuinely such a strange and uplifting felling, when you’ve been watching somebody make videos for 75% of your life, it’s just so inspirational to  see you doing well it makes me so happy
I love how Edgar immediately brought the leash with him when you came home
The fact that Edgar missed you so much and picked up the leash for a walk was so cute. Keep making these awesome vlogs bro!
Seeing Felix and Marzia happy to be in each other’s presence just doing normal things, like shopping.  It makes me want to get married.

I genuinely enjoy this vlogs, it's like a wholesome slice of life anime where you get smiling all the time. I really love this, it's great to see how pewds really enjoys his time in Japan.
(And also i really enjoy the Edgar and Maya screen time, so cute)
I love how deeply he cares for Mya like his reasoning for taking her out. He’s so pure
Love how Eggy brings his leash when Felix gets back like, "Dad! You've been gone forever! Take me on a walk now!"
Nothing to see here. Just a man, with his wife, and 2 lovely pups, living their best lives! Loving the vlogs, Pewds.
If pewds and marzia just decide to travel for the rest of their lives and filmed it i would be okay with that
It’s so refreshing to see Felix enjoying making content so much and exploring new content ideas
16:44 this is too pure for my heart

There's something so calming and so satisfying about their vlogs. The simplicity and genuine happiness radiating through the video puts me in such a happy mood. It's raw and real but the vibes are aesthetically pleasing, a perfectly good mix. I aspire to have the kind of life like they have, full of love, adventure and just finding happiness in the little things. I wish you both a wonderful life in your new home and I thank you for sharing bits of it to us <3
The way Edger welcomed  Felix when he came back home.....and then brought the leash to him.....man...my heart melted

There are many wonderful things in Japan
I'm very very happy that PewDiePie introduces it
I tear up multiple times in these vlogs because it is so heartwarming to see them just living life and being happy. It’s been so amazing to watch their journey through the years🥹️

Many YouTubers would title this video something like “I BOUGHT A TESLA!”… but Pewds is not like that, he’s just one of us and he knows that is more valuable the journey than the vehicle. That’s why I love this channel so much

Man, Felix, I know there’s almost no chance you’ll ever read this but I can’t tell you how much I’m loving these videos. The content, the editing, the music, the style… I’ve enjoyed your content for years but these Japan vlogs are making me feel things. It’s weird how video of a place I’ve never been can make me feel nostalgic and sentimental but I guess it reminds me of the brief time I lived in London, a place I fell in love with and was vastly different from my own home.

Thank you for these. They’re amazing.
It amazes me how good of a couple you and Marzia are. You just look so natural together, and it's great seeing you both so happy in Japan.
8:05 I can't help but be amazed at what he knows about the origins of Odaiba. He definitely knows more about Japan than most Japanese.
16:07 hands down funniest moment of the vlog “is that the Statue of Liberty.?… why’s it here?”
14:36 my heart stopped Marzia looks so amazing!! Loving the vlogs so much! So happy to see Felix and Marzia enjoying their yime in Japan!!
These vlogs are just like a perfect antistress, they make me feel so calm and relaxed. Enjoy your lives in Japan, Felix and Marzia!
I havent watched pewds since 2012 and just to see Maya and Edgar still kicking it... so happy to see there still living there most happy pug lives!
It's crazy, most channels after this long have got nothing left. But this series has reignited my love for pewds and youtube.
Already starting to appreciate the aesthetic of those overhead wires?? Wow, Felix. You’re adjusting faster than I thought!
16:47 - Marzia the troll master......

暑い日々が続きますが、お元気ですか？
日本はこれから夏祭りシーズン。
日本の夏を楽しんで下さい
Congrats on the new car Pewds, I'm glad you're enjoying your life in Japan, always so humble! Glad to see you're happy.

I love how simple, raw, and peaceful these vlogs are. They aren't aiming to be some extravagant movie that HAS to have some point to them. It's a TRUE vlog.  
Your Bros across the world are so happy for you both, and we thank you for taking us on this journey!
I grew up on pewdiepie, watching his videos for a decade now, and these japan vlogs are the best content I have seen and enjoyed from him.
14:52 I love those characters. That's name is Chiikawa.This name means small and cute.
wishing you and marzia all the best, nice to see you both happy in the place you belong :)
7:40 I am impressed by Edgar's camera skills!

I'm Japanese.
This summer becomes hot so as to be said to be abnormality.
As it is humid, I suffer from heat stroke in it unlike Europe in the summer in Japan. Please take a rest as soon as you felt an accident in physical condition even a little.
Really take care!
I pray to be able to spend life in Japan happily
The whole vid is so cute and wholesome, I can't stop smiling. Glad that you're enjoying together with your family, King!
3:30 I have never seen Edgar so active
I love how Felix just makes sure to speak japanese to the cat to make sure it understands him

When we were younger we enjoyed watching pewds playing video games and shouting at the computer but as we grow older we realized that the new content pewds uploads is what we needed now, calmer and refreshing.

Just love watching Felix and Marzia explore their new home and surroundings. Need more food pics, lol. And omg, the baby pack and sling for the puppers? At that rate, how can Felix think he was at the family park without his children?
The streets look incredible!
I can't believe they went to hang out with Ash Ketchum, what a crazy crossover

I just wanna to thank you for making videos like this. 
For the past year I’ve been battling with mental health problems and your latest videos of your life in Japan have been a safe heaven for my thoughts. 
I think it is really nice to get to know the culture and its also really nice to see the way you guys go about life. See how you appreciate the little things really puts things into perspective. 
Also, your dogs are really cute. That helps. 
Never posted a comment on YouTube, so I don’t know how to end this. Just imagine me awkwardly walking away.

Know what i love is that i know he has mega money but isnt austentatious and outrageous with it like most would be who came into that kind of money. Like not buying a Lambo but having practical cars (volvo in the UK, Toyota and tesla in japan), doesnt flaunt anything, lives in a modest house not a massive mansion etc. Felix has done extremely well to keep himself grounded and its amazing :)
The glee in Edgar's eyes as he asks for a walk is so wholesome

These vlogs are just so wholesome, almost making me cry. The world is so dark and depressing right now but these videos give me a weird sense of hope that one day I can have a happy quiet little life like this too.

I believe pewds should continue this vlogging series as long as he can. Because Japan is a place which everyone love and it is full of surprises. I know he can't do it for the whole life, but he should do it until it joyfull. Peace!

The joy of random discoveries, the simple bliss of a normal bike ride in the perfect weather, and the warmth and safety you feel when driving around with your best friend. It is an absolute delight to experience Japan through your vlogs, Felix! Thank you for sharing!

I think we’ve finally seen the end of the gaming age for pewds, now we get to see his life after 100 million subs. I honestly wouldn’t change a thing. I hope Felix and Marzia have an amazing life together.

One of the nice things about Pewdiepie move to Japan was, we Asian can enjoy watch the vlogs in the morning  It was such a calm days, really good to see you, Marzia, and the two babes living nicely in Japan! Hope you all stay healthy as always ️
Reminds me of my first trips to Japan, so cute! You guys should walk a bit further to enter Venus Fort on Odaiba

been supporting pewds since forever!! i imagine laughing over him when he gets jumpscare in every horror game that he plays and now seeing him doing vlogs and just enjoying his life in japan just felt heart warming, i just wish for them all the best.

I feel like pewds's channel has changed so much thru the years, i remember when i first subscribed to pewds i was maybe 11 or 12 yrs old, back when i was in my schooling times it was all games and comedy i would come home and watch pewds play games literally everyday and now im in my 20s and i feel so relaxed watching these vlogs after a hard day at work its like im all grown up and the things i find interesting changes as well and the channel grows and changes as well , curious to see where it will go when i become a father in my 30s ️
I love these vlogs so much! If you love making these as much as we all enjoy watching them, please don't ever stop making them Felix <3
Pewds' content is so different than it used to be yet its still so enjoyable
Watching this makes me feel i am in japan and also the positive vibes i feel in this videos is so fun, calm and beautiful, i love this
Your Vlogs are definitely calming. Also I can't get enough of Edgar , him greeting you at the door and was ready to go for a walk  loving it
This video was really relaxing and chilled back, even got a few chuckles out it. Very happy for you guys and enjoying the content.
